overview: Disc 1: Dunkirk (Sept. 1, 1943) ; The Battle of Norway (early 1940) ; The bombing of England (Fall 1940) ; The Battle of Malta (June 1941) ; North Africa (Nov. 1942)  Disc 2: Monte Cassino (Sept. 3, 1943) ; D-Day (June 6, 1944) ; Retaking France (6 weeks after D-Day) ; Operation Dragoon (Aug. 1944) ; Battle of the Bulge (Dec. 1944)  Disc 3: The fall of Singapore (Oct. 1941) ; Pearl Harbor (Dec. 7, 1941) ; Battle of Midway (June 2, 1942) ; The Solomon Islands (July, 1942)  Disc 4: The Gilbert Islands (Nov. 1943) ; Burma (spring, 1943) ; Battle in Palau (Summer, 1944) ; Liberation of the Philippines  Disc 5: Operation Dragoon (Aug. 1944) ; Battle of the Bulge (Dec. 1944) ; The last stronghold (Nov. 1944) ; Mount Hot Rock (Feb. 19, 1945)
title: WWII Battlefront
